text: @Yamiche @realDonaldTrump, if you were doing your job the time to think and do something about COVID-19 was January, February and March. Your performance and leadership has been woefully inadequate from the inception of COVID-19 to the Present. Best way to serve 🇺🇸 ... you and @VP RESIGN
